title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when selecting SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI. This behavior is unexpected and should not occur.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the SWT example ControlExample under the Text tab, a beep sound is emitted. Clicking on other buttons also triggers the beep sound.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K
2. Open the SWT example ControlExample
3. Go to the Text tab
4. Select the option StylesSWT.SINGLE
5. Select the option StylesSWT.MULTI
